languages.text: "И потому железный жрец всеми силами препятствует и саботирует наш штурм, отказываясь выделять войска и десантные ладьи. Но Торбальд Железношкурый не будет воевать по указке жрецов! Если мой план битвы отвергнут, пусть слуги Омниссии справляются сами! Может, их жизни ничего и не стоят в сравнении с их храмами, но Волки ставят себя выше!"

"Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"
languages.original_text: "И потому железный жрец всеми силами препятствует и саботирует наш штурм, отказываясь выделять войска и десантные ладьи. Но Торбальд Железношкурый не будет воевать по указке жрецов! Если мой план битвы отвергнут, пусть слуги Омниссии справляются сами! Может, их жизни ничего и не стоят в сравнении с их храмами, но Волки ставят себя выше!"

Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

languages.text: “就因为这个原因，那个齿轮神甫一直在阻碍我们的进攻计划，不肯让我们的部队与撞角长船登陆作战。不过，索巴德·铁皮绝对不打算按照那个神甫的计划战斗！如果他打算否决我的作战计划，那就让欧姆尼塞亚的仆人自己去夺回这颗行星吧！或许他们认为他们的性命比不上宝贵的大教堂，但我们太空野狼很清楚我们的性命有多重要！”
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

traits.locale_text: “就因为这个原因，那个齿轮祭司一直在阻碍我们的进攻计划，不肯让我们的部队与撞角长船登陆作战。不过，索巴德·铁皮绝对不打算按照那个祭司的计划战斗！如果他打算否决我的作战计划，那就让欧姆尼塞亚的仆人自己去夺回这颗行星吧！或许他们认为他们的性命比不上宝贵的大教堂，但我们太空野狼很清楚我们的性命有多重要！”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Et c'est pour ça que le technoprêtre s'échine à gêner et à saboter notre assaut en refusant de nous confier plus d'hommes et de drekkars. Mais il est hors de question que Thorbald Peau-de-Fer combatte comme les prêtres l'entendent ! Si mon plan de bataille est rejeté, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie n'auront qu'à reprendre la planète eux-mêmes ! Ils estiment peut-être que leurs précieuses cathédrales méritent leur sacrifice, mais un Loup, lui, connaît la valeur de sa propre vie ! »
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est pour ça que le technoprêtre s'échine à gêner et à saboter notre assaut en refusant de nous confier plus d'hommes et de drekkars. Mais il est hors de question que Thorbald Peau-de-Fer combatte comme les prêtres l'entendent ! Si mon plan de bataille est rejeté, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie n'auront qu'à reprendre la planète eux-mêmes ! Ils estiment peut-être que leurs précieuses cathédrales méritent leur sacrifice, mais un Loup, lui, connaît la valeur de sa propre vie ! »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「だから歯車の司祭たちは俺たちの兵力を拒否し、ドレッカールを上陸させて、俺たちの攻撃を妨害するのに躍起になっているんだ。しかしトールバルド・アイアンハイドは司祭の条件では戦わない！俺の戦闘計画が拒否されれば、万機神の下僕たちは自分たちで惑星を奪還できる！自分たちの命など大切な聖堂に比べればなんの意味もないと思っているのかもしれないが、狼は自分の命の価値を知っている！」
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

traits.locale_text: 「だから歯車の司祭たちは俺たちの兵力を拒否し、ドレッカールを上陸させて、俺たちの攻撃を妨害するのに躍起になっているんだ。しかしトールバルド・アイアンハイドは司祭の条件では戦わない！俺の戦闘計画が拒否されれば、万機神の下僕たちは自分たちで惑星を奪還できる！自分たちの命など大切な聖堂に比べればなんの意味もないと思っているのかもしれないが、狼は自分の命の価値を知っている！」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Por eso mismo el engranasacerdote está tan empeñado en obstaculizar y sabotear nuestro asalto, negándonos efectivos y desplegando drekkars. ¡Pero Thorbald Piel de Hierro no luchará bajo las condiciones de unos sacerdotes! Como rechacen mi plan de ofensiva, ¡que los siervos del Omnissiah reconquisten el planeta ellos solos! Quizás se piensen que sus vidas no significan nada comparadas con sus preciosas catedrales, pero ¡un Lobo sabe lo que vale su vida!».
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

traits.locale_text: «Por eso mismo el engranasacerdote está tan empeñado en obstaculizar y sabotear nuestro asalto, negándonos efectivos y desplegando drekkars. ¡Pero Thorbald Piel de Hierro no luchará bajo las condiciones de unos sacerdotes! Como rechacen mi plan de ofensiva, ¡que los siervos del Omnissiah reconquisten el planeta ellos solos! Quizás se piensen que sus vidas no significan nada comparadas con sus preciosas catedrales, pero ¡un Lobo sabe lo que vale su vida!».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Daher ist der Zahnradpriester so versessen darauf, unseren Angriff zu behindern und zu sabotieren, indem er uns Truppen und Lande-Drekkars verweigert. Doch Thorbald Eisenhaut kämpft nicht nach den Bedingungen von Priestern! Wenn mein Kampfplan abgelehnt wird, können die Diener des Omnissiah den Planeten selbst zurückerobern! Vielleicht glauben sie, ihre Leben wären im Vergleich zu ihren geliebten Kathedralen nichts wert, doch ein Wolf weiß, was sein Leben wert ist!"
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"

traits.locale_text: "Daher ist der Zahnradpriester so versessen darauf, unseren Angriff zu behindern und zu sabotieren, indem er uns Truppen und Lande-Drekkars verweigert. Doch Thorbald Eisenhaut kämpft nicht nach den Bedingungen von Priestern! Wenn mein Kampfplan abgelehnt wird, können die Diener des Omnissiah den Planeten selbst zurückerobern! Vielleicht glauben sie, ihre Leben wären im Vergleich zu ihren geliebten Kathedralen nichts wert, doch ein Wolf weiß, was sein Leben wert ist!"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Tam da bu yüzden dişli rahip, bize birlik vermeyi reddedip drekkarların inişini engelliyor ve taarruzumuzu yavaşlatıp baltalamaya çalışıyor. Ancak Thorbald Demirpost, rahiplerin kurallarına göre savaşmaz! Savaş planı önerim reddedilirse Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, gezegeni kendi başlarına geri alabilir! Rahipler, kendi canlarının o kıymetli katedrallerine kıyasla önemsiz olduğunu düşünebilir ama bir Kurt, kendi canının değerini bilir!"
languages.original_text: "Which is why the cog-priest is so intent on hindering and sabotaging our assault by refusing us forces and landing drekkars. But Thorbald Ironhide won't fight on the terms of priests! If my battle plan is rejected, the Omnissiah's servants can retake the planet themselves! Maybe they think their lives mean nothing compared to their precious cathedrals, but a Wolf knows what his life is worth!"
